name.message: SuperGenPass for Google Chrome™ by Denis

description.message: Generate passwords for websites without any clicks and with an extra portable SuperGenPass engine.

unlock_prompt_retry.message:
Previous attempt was incorrect. Try again or cancel.
Password for $1:

options_passwords_add_note.message: Note for yourself to identify the password:

options_passwords_add_optional_explanati.message: These settings may be used to increase the security of your passwords, but changing any defaults means you have to remember more to generate your passwords on a computer without this extension.

options_instructions_store.message: Store master password on %1this options page%2.

options_instructions_store_clarify.message: Don’t worry, the password itself is not stored, only its hash is.

options_instructions_keys.message: On any website, focus a password box and choose your password from the menu by pressing buttons %11%2 to %39%4.

options_instructions_unlock.message: The first time you use a password since opening your browser, the extension will ask you to unlock it.

options_instructions_unlock_clarify.message: Careful! Evil website owners might want to steal your password, so always make sure that the popup says ‘SuperGenPass for Google Chrome™ by Denis extension says’ and not ‘The page at ... says:’!

options_instructions_done.message: That’s it, the password field is now filled with your generated password.

options_whitelist_explain.message: If you do not want for this extension to run on some domains (say, you have your own password there), you can whitelist that domain in this field.

options_about_credits_kitten.message: Devoted to the most beautiful and smart girl ever: %1Monika%2.

options_about_credits_extra.message: Additional thanks go to %1Paul Johnston%2, %3Chris Zarate%4, %5Mark James%6, %7Twitter%8, and %9Gustav Salomonsson%10.

options_support_masking.message: The password field does not mask the characters because it is technologically impossible to do in a secure way at the moment. %1 With Chrome improving it may soon be possible, and the extension will then be updated.

options_support_github.message: For questions, suggestions and bug reports, please visit our GitHub page.

options_support_email.message: You can also contact the author privately at denis@sokolov.cc
